item.title: Changing wildy level gap
item.dc:creator: @pur3ly0wnt pur3ly0wnt
item.description:
@pur3ly0wnt wrote:

if((castOnPlayer.combatLevel + wildyLevel < combatLevel || combatLevel + wildyLevel < castOnPlayer.combatLevel) && !isInPitGame() && !inFunFight() && !inZamorak() && !inSaradomin() && !inCastleWars() && !cWarsGame()){
sM(“Your level difference is too great!”);
sM(“You need to move deeper into the Wilderness.”);

what do i change in there to increse the level gap, if not in there what do i change , can someone help me?
